gen:link.msg:message: `Allocations` MUST also be reported, because at least one of the underlying values of `Allocations` is reported. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesCashFlowStatementNonDaebHousingDvi_PrtFST1ChildrenExistParentExists1_ChildrenOfAllocations')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesCashFlowStatementNonDaebHousingDvi_PrtFST1ChildrenExistParentExists1_ChildrenOfAllocations return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesCashFlowStatementNonDaebHousingDvi_PrtFST1ChildrenExistParentExists1_Allocations')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesCashFlowStatementNonDaebHousingDvi_PrtFST1ChildrenExistParentExists1_Allocations return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`Allocations` MUST be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesCashFlowStatementNonDaebHousingDvi_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_Allocations')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesCashFlowStatementNonDaebHousingDvi_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_Allocations return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesCashFlowStatementNonDaebHousingDvi_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfAllocationsDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesCashFlowStatementNonDaebHousingDvi_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfAllocationsDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesCashFlowStatementNonDaebHousingDvi_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfAllocationsCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesCashFlowStatementNonDaebHousingDvi_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfAllocationsCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
